beats.visual: Pixel flicks on the turbo mixer; batter glows neon.
beats.gag_note: Mixer hum builds like a superhero transformation.

beats.visual: Mixer blasts pancake spiral; Pixel leaps onto the counter island.
beats.gag_note: Kitchen utensils salute as the cyclone forms.

beats.visual: Spinning pancakes orbit fridge magnets cheering in speech bubbles.
Pixel rides a spatula surfboard through the batter vortex.
Neon batter splashes window; Pixel winks at viewers mid-spin.
beats.gag_note: Fourth-wall break with batter smiley face.

beats.visual: Pixel slow-motion dodges syrup comet streaking past ears.
Cyclone gulps toaster; Pixel slaps giant off switch with tail.
Batter rains confetti; fridge prints instant replay for crowd.
Ceiling drip forms pancake halo as Pixel takes a bow.

tts_line: Pixel upgrades breakfast to pancake parkour mode.
style_prompt: cartoon neon glitch cat, pixel shimmer fur, clean bold outlines, flat neon colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, turbo pancake cyclone swirling over chrome kitchen counters, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
